channel.title: CVE Feed for Samsung Mobile -- Samsung Camera
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Samsung Mobile -- Samsung Camera

item.title: CVE-2022-23998|2024-08-03T03:59:23.260Z -- samsung%20mobile -- samsung%20camera
item.description: Improper access control vulnerability in Camera prior to versions 11.1.02.16 in Android R(11), 10.5.03.77 in Android Q(10) and 9.0.6.68 in Android P(9) allows untrusted applications to take a picture in screenlock status.

item.title: CVE-2024-20854|2024-06-04T17:40:43.514Z -- samsung%20mobile -- samsung%20camera
item.description: Improper handling of insufficient privileges vulnerability in Samsung Camera prior to versions 12.1.0.31 in Android 12, 13.1.02.07 in Android 13, and 14.0.01.06 in Android 14 allows local attackers to access image data.

item.title: CVE-2024-20854|2024-08-01T22:06:36.824Z -- samsung%20mobile -- samsung%20camera
item.description: Improper handling of insufficient privileges vulnerability in Samsung Camera prior to versions 12.1.0.31 in Android 12, 13.1.02.07 in Android 13, and 14.0.01.06 in Android 14 allows local attackers to access image data.
